T02D3445:103b-1: a'arya shr'i m'a na b'a d'i r'a dza s'a dha nam /
T02D3445:103b-3: dpal ldan 'phags pa ngag gi rgyal po'i sgrub thabs /
T02D3445:103b-5: ye shes rang bzhin mgon phyag 'tshal //
T02D3445:103b-6: bya ba'i rgyud kyi rjes 'brangs nas //
T02D3445:103b-7: dngos grub thams cad rab ster ba //
T02D3445:103b-8: de yi sgrub thabs bdag gis brjod //
T02D3445:103b-9: dang por re zhig sngags pas yid dang mthun pa'i gnas ji ltar bde bas nye bar 'dug ste /
T02D3445:103b-10: sdug bsngal gyi rgya mtshor lhung ba'i sems can gyi khams la bltas nas /
T02D3445:103b-12: sdug bsngal ba'i sems can 'di rnams 'khor bar 'khor te /
T02D3445:103b-13: de rnams la bdag gis 'jam pa'i dbyangs su gyur nas /
T02D3445:103b-14: bla na med pa'i go 'phang mchog la rab tu dgod par bya'o zhes so //
T02D3445:103b-15: de nas bris sku la sogs pa bkram nas bcom ldan 'das 'jam pa'i dbyangs dang /
T02D3445:103b-18: byang chub sems dpa' rnams mdun du dmigs te /
T02D3445:103b-19: me tog la sogs pa rnams kyis mchod cing phyag 'tshal nas /
T02D3445:103b-21: slan chad mi bgyid cing sdom pa dang /
T02D3445:103b-22: bsod nams la rjes su yi rang ba dang /
T02D3445:103b-24: gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba dang /
T02D3445:104a-1: sems bskyed pa yang byas nas tshigs su bcad pa 'di gnyis kyis bya ste /
T02D3445:104a-2: dkon mchog gsum la bdag skyabs mchi //
T02D3445:104a-3: sdig pa thams cad so sor bshags //
T02D3445:104a-4: 'gro ba'i dge la rjes yi rang //
T02D3445:104a-5: sangs rgyas byang chub yid kyis gzung //
T02D3445:104a-6: byang chub sems mchog bdag gis bskyed //
T02D3445:104a-7: sems can thams cad mgron du gnyer //
T02D3445:104a-8: byang chub spyod mchog yid 'ong spyad //
T02D3445:104a-9: 'gro la phan phyir sangs rgyas shog / de nas lam bsten par bya'o //
T02D3445:104a-10: aom sva bh'a ba shuddha: sarba dharm'a:sva bh'a ba shuddho& ham /
T02D3445:104a-11: zhes pa'i don khong du chud par byas nas /
T02D3445:104a-12: lan gsum brjod nas rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag
T02D3445:104a-13: cing chos thams cad bdag med par mos pa bya'o
T02D3445:104a-14: // khams gsum po ni stong pa nyid dang mtshan nyid med pa gzung ba dang /
T02D3445:104a-15: 'dzin pa dang bral bar bltas nas /
T02D3445:104a-16: rang gi snying gar aa yig las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor /
T02D3445:104a-17: de'i steng du mu: yig gser btso ma'i kha dog
T02D3445:104a-18: lta bu de las byung ba'i 'od zer gyi tshogs
T02D3445:104a-19: kyis 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du bkye zhing
T02D3445:104a-20: snang bar mdzad nas ji ltar skal ba dang ldan
T02D3445:104a-21: pa'i sems can gyi don mdzad de /
T02D3445:104a-22: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bskul nas de'i 'od de sa bon la rab tu zhugs te /
T02D3445:104a-23: de thams cad yongs su gyur pa las bdag nyid 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi skur bsgom par bya'o //
T02D3445:104a-24: gser zhun ma lta bu zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa /
T02D3445:104a-25: seng ge'i steng na padma dang zla ba'i gdan la skyil krung phyed pas bzhugs pa /
T02D3445:104a-26: zur phud gsum pa'i rin po che'i dbu rgyan can /
T02D3445:104a-27: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'od lta bu gzhon nu'i rnam pa can gyi gzugs dang ldan pa /
T02D3445:104a-28: rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa /
T02D3445:104a-29: sgeg pa'i nyams dang ldan pa /
T02D3445:104a-31: phyag gnyis kyis chos kyi 'khor lo'i phyag rgya mdzad pa /
T02D3445:104a-32: phyag g-yas pa na ma reg par shes rab kyi
T02D3445:104a-33: pha rol tu phyin pa dang bcas pa'i autpal bsnams
T02D3445:104a-34: pa / zhabs g-yon pa'i ngar gdong la brten pa'i
T02D3445:104a-35: khro bo chen po gshin rje gshed sku mdog nag
T02D3445:104a-36: po mi bzad pa'i zhal mche ba gtsigs pa skra
T02D3445:104a-38: kun nas dmar ba'i spyan zlum pa /
T02D3445:104a-39: phyag g-yas pas bcom ldan 'das kyi rje ngar la reg pa /
T02D3445:104b-0: g-yon pa @104b dbyug pa bsnams pa'o //
T02D3445:104b-4: thugs rnams la zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la aom a'a:h'um zhes pa'i yi ge dkar po dang /
T02D3445:104b-6: nag po'i mdog can rnams rim pa bzhin du bkod la /
T02D3445:104b-7: de nas nu ma'i bar du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la ma:yig bsam par bya'o //
T02D3445:104b-8: de nas mchod bya dang mchod byed dbyer med par dmigs nas /
T02D3445:104b-9: lha rnams kyis rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i mchod pa dang /
T02D3445:104b-10: bstod pa bdag nyid la byed par bltas nas /
T02D3445:104b-11: spro ba dang bsdu ba ji srid skyo bar ma gyur pa de srid du bsgom par bya'o //
T02D3445:104b-12: de ltar rtag tu sgom bar byed pa ni /
T02D3445:104b-13: sangs rgyas kyi byang chub rab tu 'grub par 'gyur te /
T02D3445:104b-14: tshe 'di nyid la brtse ba chen po mgon po 'jam pa'i dbyangs thob par 'gyur ro //
T02D3445:104b-15: bsgoms pas ngal na rang gi snying gar zla ba'i
T02D3445:104b-16: dkyil 'khor la sngags bkod nas ma chags pa'i yid
T02D3445:104b-18: de nas bzlas pa'i sngags ni 'di'o //
T02D3445:104b-19: aom dharma dh'a tu b'a g'i shva ri mu:de ltar
T02D3445:104b-20: bzlas pa byas nas kyang mi ngal na bsgom par
T02D3445:104b-21: bya'o // gal te ldang bar 'dod na slar yang de bzhin du yang dag par mchod pa dang /
T02D3445:104b-23: dge ba yongs su bsngo ba dang /
T02D3445:104b-24: tshigs su bcad pa 'dis bzod pa gsol bar bya ste /
T02D3445:104b-25: bdag ni mi shes blo rmongs pas //
T02D3445:104b-26: nyes pa ji snyed bgyis pa gang //
T02D3445:104b-27: gang phyir lus can skyob pa yi //
T02D3445:104b-28: mgon po khyed la bzod par gsol //
T02D3445:104b-29: 'gro ba rnams la phan pa'i phyir //
T02D3445:104b-30: smon lam yang dag gdab par bya //
T02D3445:104b-31: bdag gi dge ba 'di yis ni //
T02D3445:104b-32: sangs rgyas nyid ni thob nas kyang //
T02D3445:104b-33: srid pa'i rgya mtsho zab mo las //
T02D3445:104b-34: 'gro ba ma lus 'don par shog / de nas
T02D3445:104b-35: chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du mos pas 'gro
T02D3445:104b-36: ba thams cad 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi rang bzhin du
T02D3445:104b-37: bltas nas / rang gi lha'i nga rgyal dang ldan pas ji ltar bde bar gnas par bya'o //
T02D3445:104b-38: de ltar thun mtshams bzhi'am thun mtshams gsum du 'di bzhin du bya'o //
T02D3445:104b-39: bdag gis sgrub thabs 'di byas pas //
T02D3445:104b-40: 'bras bu gang thob de yis ni //
